A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing film. I am usually in agreement with the critics but I left this film shocked and confused. Did the critics see a completely different film? Bad writing\, bad storytelling\, bad jokes\, plot holes. I have not cringed so much in a film since watching Spider-Man 3. I know it's \"just a film\" but I am passionate about movies and had high expectations for this movie. This film isn't \"different\,\" it's just bad. Rogue One was different and it was great. This movie felt like a generic blockbuster that could possibly be enjoyed by those who are easily entertained. There is so much wrong with this film but I am not going sit here typing it all out as many others have already done that. I will\, however\, give this film one star because of the strong acting from Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver. Also\, the porgs are very cute\, Crait was a cool planet (too bad it was underused) and the crystal fox creatures are adorable. I also enjoyed Rey's scenes with Kylo Ren. Those are the only positive things I can say about this film. It really is a disappointment.
